Trade/Device Name(s): GlucoSure HT Plus Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GlucoSure HT Plus Blood Glucose Monitoring System for self-testing blood glucose in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of blood glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, palm, or forearm for self-testing by people with diabetes mellitus at home as an aid in monitoring diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
